name: Chiahaya~
greetingText: Meeting you in my prime was life's greatest gift.
wishText: May your birthday be as lovely as you are, and as happy as the joy you bring me.
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you very very very sincerely!!!
text2: I want to give you a surprise.
text3: I've thought about it for a long time.
text4: I realize that I want to do something
text5Content: You are so special to me.
outroText: I hope you will like this little surprise haha.
replayText: You can watch it again if you like! Or...
